extends Object
    Manage internal properties settings

    2.0

    2.0
    Author:

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExtendedProperties()
      Creates an empty property list with no default values.

      • getBooleanProperty

        public boolean getBooleanProperty(String key)
        Get a property as a boolean. Returns the value true if the string argument is not null and is equal, ignoring case, to the string "true". Returns false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        key - Property name
        Returns:
        true or false

      • getListProperty

        public ArrayList<String> getListProperty(String key)
        Get a property as an ArrayList. Uses ',' as the default separator.
        Parameters:
        key - Property name
        Returns:
        Array of string values, or null if no property present
